data.title: Pitch Perfect 4 Release Date Rumors: Is It Coming Out?
data.meta_description: Here are the latest Pitch Perfect 4 release date rumors. This is when a sequel could potentially be coming out.
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Fans hunting for Pitch Perfect 4 release date rumors are no doubt desperate to know when the Bellas will be getting together and when a new sequel could be coming out.

Here’s all the Pitch Perfect 4 release date information we know so far, and all the details on when it is coming out.

Pitch Perfect’s release date could arrive by late 2024.

However, at the time of writing, there has been no word from Universal or any of the people involved with making or starring in the previous movies about a potential sequel. A late 2024 release date is an estimate based on if a movie was announced relatively soon, but that might not ever happen.

Despite cast members being seen together and speaking fondly of the Pitch Perfect franchise, there have been no teases or official mentions of Pitch Perfect 4 being in the works.

With Pitch Perfect 3 ending in a way that tied everyone’s stories up, some might argue that a Pitch Perfect 4 would be unnecessary. Of course, it may still happen.

This date is an estimation based on the information we have so far. ComingSoon will provide an update to this story once we receive official details.

Where is Pitch Perfect 4 coming out?

Pitch Perfect 4 is anticipated to come out in theatres in late 2024.

Of course, this relies on a new movie actually being produced.

The official synopsis for the original Pitch Perfect reads:

“Beca (Anna Kendrick) is that girl who’d rather listen to what’s coming out of her headphones than what’s coming out of you. Arriving at her new college, she finds herself not right for any clique but somehow is muscled into one that she never would have picked on her own: alongside mean girls, sweet girls and weird girls whose only thing in common is how good they sound when they sing together.”
